text: François Goulard (; born 21 September 1953 in Vannes) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Morbihan department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. He has been appointed as minister of transports from 2004 to 2005 and minister of superior education from 2005 to 2007. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:People from Vannes Category:Liberal Democracy (France) politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:United Republic politicians Category:Government ministers of France Category:École Centrale Paris alumni Category:Sciences Po alumni Category:École nationale d'administration alumni Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: François Goulard
